response.original_title: Monero Means Money: Cryptocurrency 101, Live from Leipzig
response.overview: Monero Means Money is a Documentary Feature Film that explains Monero, a fungible cryptocurrency. Dr. Daniel Kim gives a deep-dive of the technical, economic, and social aspects of fiat, Bitcoin, and Monero from 2008 to today.
response.title: Monero Means Money: Cryptocurrency 101, Live from Leipzig
